resources.string: This language will be preferred when you watch series
Sync your Anime watch progress with AniList.
Casting is not supported on this device yet.
VLC is required to play videos on your PC.\nMake sure to only download and install the official package from videolan.org or your system package manager.
Do you want to activate this episode now?
Activating on Desktop is no longer supported.\nEnable (Google) DoH in your browser and use the extension instead.
You can go back now or continue browsing and activate some more.
Could not activate hoster, please try again later.
Maintaining this project is time and money consuming, please consider contributing financially to support it's upkeep.
The amount you want to donate is completely up to you, but keep in mind that only GitHub Sponsors or Patreon (linked with GitHub) can be recognized.
You are not protected against fake domains right now!
Additionally you can view Burning-Series search results directly in this app then.
Make sure to check the option to open supported links and add every link below.
An error occurred, please try again later
Settings synced, you can close this on both ends now.
Scan the QR Code with your Smartphone and make sure both devices are in the same network.
Device not found, make sure both devices are in the same network.
This seems to take some time, maybe try again later.
